name: Candy Crops
description:
12/20/2020

I went back through and fixed up some bugs and polished it up a bit.  I do plan on making a better game play loop, but for now I'm happy with the result. So welcome Candy Crops version 0.2.1!!!

12/19/2020

I made this for a secret santa jam but I waited till the last few days to work on it; as a result its still pretty buggy, I might go through and fix it up later.
